# <a name="read-receipts"></a><span data-ttu-id="4b54f-102">Leesbevestigingen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4b54f-102">Read receipts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4b54f-103">Een leesbevestiging of ontvangstbevestiging aanvragen voor uw bericht in de webversie van Outlook:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4b54f-103">To request a read receipt or a delivery receipt for your message in Outlook on the web:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="4b54f-104">Selecteer de drie puntjes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4b54f-104">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="4b54f-105">aan de bovenkant van het deelvenster voor het opstellen van berichten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4b54f-105">at the top of the message compose pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="4b54f-106">Selecteer **Berichtopties weergeven**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4b54f-106">Select **Show message options**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="4b54f-107">Selecteer **een leesbevestiging vragen** of **een ontvangstbevestiging vragen**of beide.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4b54f-107">Select **Request a read receipt** or **Request a delivery receipt**, or both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4b54f-108">Als u wilt kiezen hoe Outlook reageert op verzoeken om leesbevestiging, gaat u naar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4b54f-108">To choose how Outlook responds to read receipt requests, go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="4b54f-109">**Instellingen**  >  voor **Alle Outlook-instellingen**  >  weergeven **Afhandeling van berichten**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4b54f-109">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Message handling**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4b54f-110">Zie [bevestigingen voor lezen in de webversie van Outlook](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157)voor meer informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4b54f-110">For more information, see [Read receipts in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span></span>
